attributes.action: Ditch the mini-budget immediately and pay closer attention to the cost of living
attributes.additional_details: Mini-budget announced on last week 23rd September 2022 was unfair at best and shows incompetency of the government at worse. Therefore, IMMEDIATE ACTION REQUIRED FOR MANY NOT FEW!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
attributes.background: Ditch the mini-budget immediately and pay closer attention to the cost of living crisis!!!

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/623684
